scripts.build:datatypes: ng build datatypes-layers && ng build datatypes-map-state && ng build datatypes-owc-json && ng build datatypes-user-info
scripts.build:services: ng build services-layers && ng build services-map-state && ng build services-owc-json && ng build services-util-store
scripts.build: npm run build:datatypes && npm run build:services && ng build base-layers-raster && ng build layer-control && ng build map-navigator && ng build map-ol && ng build dataset-explorer && ng build observation-explorer && ng build cookie-alert && ng build user-info
scripts.test:services: ng test services-layers && ng test services-map-state && ng test services-owc-json && ng test services-util-store
scripts.test_: npm run test:datatypes && npm run test:services && ng test base-layers-raster && ng test layer-control && ng test map-navigator && ng test map-ol && ng test dataset-explorer && ng test observation-explorer && ng test cookie-alert && ng test user-info
scripts.compodoc: node node_modules/npm-git-dependencies -p doc_modules && compodoc -p tsconfig.doc.json -n "UKIS Client"
